He read a large volume of books.
There is a high volume of traffic.
She does voluntary work on weekends.
The animal was vulnerable in the wild.
He felt vulnerable after the incident.
Elderly people are vulnerable to scams.
The system is vulnerable to attacks.
The products are stored in a warehouse.
The warehouse is full of goods.
He works in a large warehouse.
He showed weakness in his argument.
They identified the weakness in the plan.
She talked about her strengths and weaknesses.
The government cares about public welfare.
Her welfare is important to us.
examples.tr: Onun iyilik hali bizim için önemlidir.

examples.en: Social welfare programs help many people.
examples.tr: Sosyal yardım programları birçok insana yardımcı olur.

examples.en: He is concerned about children's welfare.
She likes tea, whereas he prefers coffee.
examples.tr: O çayı sever, oysa o kahveyi tercih eder.

examples.en: He is tall, whereas his brother is short.
The old model is slow, whereas the new one is fast.
examples.tr: Eski model yavaş, oysa yenisi hızlı.

examples.en: She studied hard, whereas he did not.
examples.tr: O çok çalıştı, oysa o çalışmadı.

examples.en: The first option is cheap, whereas the second is expensive.
examples.tr: İlk seçenek ucuz, oysa ikincisi pahalı.

examples.en: They signed an agreement whereby both sides benefit.
examples.tr: Her iki tarafın fayda sağladığı bir anlaşma imzaladılar.

examples.en: He created a system whereby students can study online.
examples.tr: Öğrencilerin çevrimiçi çalışabildiği bir sistem oluşturdu.

examples.en: The company introduced a method whereby waste is reduced.
examples.tr: Şirketin atığı azalttığı bir yöntem tanıttı.

examples.en: She developed a process whereby tasks are completed faster.
examples.tr: Görevlerin daha hızlı tamamlandığı bir süreç geliştirdi.

examples.en: They set rules whereby safety is ensured.
She is known for her wisdom.
His wisdom helped solve the problem.
examples.tr: Onun bilgeliği sorunu çözmeye yardımcı oldu.

examples.en: Her words were full of wisdom.
He was a witness to the accident.
She wants to travel the world.
Different cultures live around the world.
examples.tr: Dünyanın dört bir yanında farklı kültürler yaşıyor.

examples.en: He dreams of a better world.
examples.tr: Daha iyi bir dünya hayal ediyor.
Başkalarına yardım etmek her zaman değerlidir.

examples.en: The trip was long but worthwhile.
It’s worthwhile to learn a new skill.
examples.tr: Yeni bir beceri öğrenmek zahmete değer.

examples.en: The project took time but it was worthwhile.
examples.tr: Proje zaman aldı ama buna değdi.
